import Header from './Header'; import Main from './Main'; import Footer from './Footer'; import PopupWithForm from './PopupWithForm'; import ImagePopup from './ImagePopup'; import { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen,setIsEditProfilePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen,setisAddPlacePopupOpen] = useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen,setisEditAvatarPopupOpen] = useState(false); return (
setisEditAvatarPopupOpen(true)} onEditProfile ={() => setIsEditProfilePopupOpen(true)} onAddPlace={() => setisAddPlacePopupOpen(true)} />
); } export default App;
